going to separate into these amazing

all right so let me show you how to do

it's it says to cook in a pan of water

the flesh is really hard and firm so you

see nice and clean and I'm watching you

longer thicker so much easier to work
with
stop trying to piece together little

and I want you to roast this for about
an hour to an hour and 15 minutes
